title: Full-Stack Developer (TailwindCSS, Next.js/SvelteKit, Supabase) – Long-Term
job_overview:
We're hiring one experienced full-stack developer for multiple long-term projects using AI (Claude AI) to build modern platforms.

Stack: TailwindCSS, Next.js or SvelteKit, Supabase
Details: Paid, long-term, multiple projects.
We're looking for someone reliable, fast, and fully autonomous.

If that’s you, send your portfolio or recent work examples.
